external_references.source_name: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025
external_references.description: Matej Havranek. (2025, February 20). DeceptiveDevelopment targets freelance developers. Retrieved October 17, 2025.
Unit 42. (2023, November 21). Hacking Employers and Seeking Employment: Two Job-Related Campaigns Bear Hallmarks of North Korean Threat Actors. Retrieved October 17, 2025.

objects.description: [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has established a connection with the C2 server over TCP traffic.(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023) [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has also created a TCP reverse shell communicating via a socket connection over ports 1245, 80, 2245, 3001, and 5000.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)
